includeIf.querystring: Select count(ASSET) NBR,STATUS,ORGANISM from MRQR_ASSETS A where A.ASSET like 'FA0%' GROUP BY ORGANISM, STATUS limit 50
Select ASSET, STATUS, ORGANISM, MRC, FUNCTION, LATEST_CATEGORY from MRQR_ASSETS A where A.ASSET like 'FA0%'

Select concat('MRN_SPE11#',MRC) MRC, concat('MRN_SPE02#24&p|AS|SET=',ASSET,'#',ASSET) ASSET, concat('MRN_SPE01#ASSETA&arg1=',ASSET) ILIAS, concat('MRN_SPE02#2&p|NS|N=',NSN,'#',NSN) NSN, concat('MRN_SPE01#SPART&arg1=',NSN) ILIAS2, concat('MRN_SPE07#PN',PN,'#',MFR) PN_MFR, if(STATUS='D',concat('MRN_SPE03#07#MRN_SPE10#AS#',STATUS),concat('MRN_SPE10#AS#',STATUS)) STATUS, SERIAL, FUNCTION, concat('MRN_SPE06#20#MRN_SPE04#L#',DESCRIPTION) DESCRIPTION, ORGANISM, IFNULL(LIMITATIONS,'MRN_SPE08#white#NO_LIMIT') LIMITATIONS from MRQR_ASSETS A where A.ASSET like 'FA0%' and if('pSTATUS'='',true,STATUS ='pSTATUS') and if('pORGANISM'='',true,ORGANISM ='pORGANISM') limit 50

queries.querystring: Select ASSET,NSN,PN,MFR,SERIAL,FUNCTION,DESCRIPTION,ORGANISM,MRC,STATUS from MRQR_ASSETS A where A.ASSET like 'FA0%' and if('pSTATUS'='',true,STATUS='pSTATUS') and if('pORGANISM'='',true,ORGANISM='pORGANISM')
